DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this project is to investigate the effects of escitalopram on monoamine transporter (SERT, DAT) availabilities as assessed by b-CIT and SPECT, and on neurophysiological parameters such as the loudness dependence of auditory evoked potentials (LDAEP) in patients with depression.
DOC.criteria: Psychiatric in or outpatients with acute depressive episode Indication for pharmacological treatment Acute suicidality Neurological or severe somatic disorders Occupational exposition to radiation >15 mSv per year Women during pregnancy or lactation
